title: Cant save progress in download
body: I tried to download the game  and i cant, the game is 16 gb and i cant download all at once so i tried to do it by parts and when i stop when i come back the game dont save the progress it made taday i download 6 gb and the game says it only need 10gb to go and when i stop it, it start again, first i thought it was a bug and i go to my local disk to see if i had the gb saved and no, i didnt have the progress.

replies.body: So first off, the 16 GB is actually a visual error within the client. You will have to let the Client download in one go though as pausing the client isn't available :( If you still haven't downloaded it make sure to let me know and we'll work towards a work around.
